5. Dataset loading utilities¶

The imblearn.datasets package is complementing the the sklearn.datasets package. The package provide both: (i) a set of imbalanced datasets to perform systematic benchmark and (ii) a utility to create an imbalanced dataset from an original balanced dataset.

5.1. Imbalanced datasets for benchmark¶

5.2. Imbalanced generator¶

make_imbalance turns an original dataset into an imbalanced dataset.
